comments: There has been confusion over this name. He was cited as Montien Srisuko in the paper's title but published plant names in the same paper as Montien. According to Bhanubong Bongchewin (pers. comm.) Srisuko is the family name. Since the author himself used Montien and has apparently published no names since 1969, the standard form Montien is maintained. Standard form changed back to Srisuko to follow Brummitt & Powell, 1992, June 2015.
examples: Lagerstroemia subangulata (Craib) Furtado & Montien in Gard. Bull. Straits Settlem., 24: 208 (1969).
source: Note from K.M. Matthew 1982 (Srisuko only). Full name from L.G. Adams
